slides.name: Overview
text: Wanderlust runs each year a few dozen of yoga events and festivals around the world.
They've decided to merge individual event sites running on Drupal into a single Wordpress site and give editors an easy way to publish rich, semantic content.
Our task—a team of three developers working remotely— was to create a storytelling engine and a new theme based on the design coming from the creative team.
And prepare the site for traffic peaks of 50.000 visitors / day when tickets go sales.
